alert.note: Alert for Escambia (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 24 at 8:57AM CDT until March 24 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Florida... Escambia River Near Century affecting Escambia County. For the Escambia River...including Century...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Escambia River Near Century. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Considerable flooding of lowlands. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:05 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 17.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:05 AM CDT Thursday was 17.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this afternoon and continue falling to 13.8 feet Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
